Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Our teachers have the full context of our enquiries/assignments and therefore provide much more reliable and considered feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from teacher felt supportive as opposed to GenAi which is just complex algorithms
